Workflow.Name: Admin | Add-Ons Alerts
Workflow.Description: This flow checks actual add-on consumption and compares it with approved add-on value, that an admin sets. The flow will send an alert to the admin for environments that exceed the approved add-on value, or are at 80% of approved add-on value.

Description.description: This flow checks actual add-on consumption and compares it with approved add-on value, that an admin sets. The flow will send an alert to the admin for environments that exceed the approved add-on value, or are at 80% of approved add-on value.
